org.franca.core.dsl.cli

Class AbstractCommandLineTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.franca.core.dsl.cli.AbstractCommandLineTool

  • public abstract class AbstractCommandLineTool
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for all command-line tools related to Franca.
    Author:
    Klaus Birken (itemis AG)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static com.google.inject.Injector injector
      A Franca-aware injector which is used for initialization of the command-line tool.
      protected FrancaPersistenceManager persistenceManager 
      protected java.lang.String toolVersion
      The version of the specific tool.
      protected org.eclipse.xtext.validation.IResourceValidator validator 
      protected boolean verbose
      Verbose flag which can be set via command line option -v.

      • setTestMode

        public static boolean setTestMode()
        Switch to unit-test mode. In test mode, we will not call System.exit() anymore.

      • getExitCode

        public static int getExitCode()
        Get exit code while in testing mode.

        Do not use this in production mode.

        protected java.lang.String getVersionString()

        Execute the actual functionality of the command line tool.

      • validateModel

        protected int validateModel(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject model,
                boolean recursively)
        Validate a model before processing it.

        The validation can be done for the model only or for all models in its resource set.
        Parameters:
        model - the model which should be validated
        recursively - if true, all models in the resource set will be validated
        Returns:
        number of errors (only continue processing if no error occurred)
